Commissioner Adam W. Parkinson
==============================

![](https://www.westnewyorknj.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Parkinson.jpg)

Commissioner Adam W. Parkinson
------------------------------

**Commissioner Adam W. Parkinson is the Director of Revenue and Finance**

#### Commissioner
